scripts.prepare-mobile: rimraf ./.temp/mobile && mkdirp ./.temp/mobile/www && ncp assets/cordova .temp/mobile/ && ncp .dist/web .temp/mobile/www && npm run add-mobile-platforms && rimraf .dist/mobile/ && trash .temp/mobile/www/**/*.js.gz
scripts.add-mobile-platforms: cd .temp/mobile && cordova platform add windows && cordova platform add android
scripts.build-mobile-windows: mkdirp .dist/mobile/windows && cd .temp/mobile && cordova build && cd ../.. && ncp .temp/mobile/platforms/windows .dist/mobile/windows
scripts.build-mobile-android: mkdirp .dist/mobile/android && cd .temp/mobile && cordova build && cd ../.. && ncp .temp/mobile/platforms/android .dist/mobile/android
scripts.build-mobile: npm run prepare-mobile && npm run generate-mobile-assets && npm run build-mobile-android && npm run build-mobile-windows
scripts.build-all: rimraf .dist && npm run build-web && npm run build-mobile && npm run build-desktop && npm run cleanup
